name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-apptemplate
title: Power App template with reusable header, footer & left navigation
shortDescription: This tablet-based canvas app helps to kickstart the development in Power Apps using reusable header, footer and left navigation components.
longDescription: This tablet-based canvas app helps to kickstart the development in Power Apps using reusable header, footer and left navigation components.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
